content: संसृ {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To go towards, approach. {@--2@} To revolve, turn round. {@--3@} To spread. {@--4@} To move. {@--5@} To go or flow together. {@--6@} To go to, obtain; पापान् संसृत्य संसारान् प्रेष्यतां याति शत्रुषु <ls>Ms. 12. 70.</ls> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To spread over, cause to move over. {@--2@} To revolve or turn round; जन्मवृद्धिक्षयैर्नित्यं संसारयति चक्रवत् <ls>Ms. 12. 124.</ls>
